solution_line_template: In June the hobby store sold {normal_sales_per_month} + {june_extra_sales} =<<{normal_sales_per_month}+{june_extra_sales}={june_sales}>>{june_sales} trading cards.
Over June and July the store sold {june_sales} + {normal_sales_per_month} = <<{june_sales}+{normal_sales_per_month}={total_sales_june_july}>>{total_sales_june_july} trading cards
